SELECT m.material_code, material_name, mat_no, cm.code_nm AS mat_nm, company_code, F_FIND_COMP_NAME(m.company_code) as company_name, unit_id, unit_no, save_stock, min_stock, max_stock, month_stock FROM material m LEFT JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE cm ON m.mat_no = cm.code and m.mat_id = cm.code_id
WHERE UPPER(material_name) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{materialName})||'%'
SELECT code AS mat_no, code_nm AS mat_nm FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE code_id = 'R_MAT'
SELECT code AS unit_no, code_nm AS unit_nm FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE code_id = 'R_UNIT'
mapper.update: UPDATE material SET material_name = #{materialName}, mat_no = #{matNo}, unit_no = #{unitNo}, company_code = #{companyCode}, MIN_STOCK = #{minStock}, MAX_STOCK = #{maxStock}, SAVE_STOCK = #{saveStock}, MONTH_STOCK = #{monthStock} WHERE material_code = #{materialCode}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(material_code),0) + 1 AS material_code FROM material
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material(material_code, material_name, company_code, unit_id, unit_no, mat_id, mat_no, save_stock, min_stock, max_stock, month_stock) VALUES(#{materialCode}, #{materialName}, #{companyCode}, 'R_UNIT', #{unitNo}, 'R_MAT', #{matNo}, #{saveStock}, #{minStock}, #{maxStock}, #{monthStock})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(inorder_code),0) + 1 AS inorder_code FROM inorder
SELECT company_code, f_find_comp_name(company_code) AS company_name FROM material WHERE material_code = #{materialCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inorder(inorder_code, inorder_date, inorder_count, company_code, material_code, comments) VALUES(#{inorderCode}, #{inorderDate}, #{inorderCount}, #{companyCode}, #{materialCode}, #{comments})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(max(io_code),0) + 1 as io_code FROM inout

SELECT material_code, F_FINDMATNAME(material_code) AS material_name, unit_no, F_FIND_MAT_STOCK(material.material_code) AS stock FROM material WHERE material_code = (SELECT material_code FROM inorder WHERE inorder_code = #{inorderCode})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inout(io_code, io_date, io_volume, unit_price, material_code, lot_no, inorder_code, inout_no, process_code, comments) VALUES(#{ioCode}, #{ioDate}, #{ioVolume}, #{unitPrice}, #{materialCode}, #{lotNo}, #{inorderCode}, #{inoutNo}, #{processCode}, #{comments})
mapper.update: UPDATE inout SET io_date = #{ioDate}, inorder_code = #{inorderCode}, material_code = #{materialCode}, io_volume = #{ioVolume}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, lot_no = #{lotNo}, process_code = #{processCode}, comments = #{comments} WHERE io_code = #{ioCode}
mapper.select: SELECT F_FINDMATNAME(material_code) AS material_name, unit_no, F_FIND_MAT_STOCK(material_code) AS stock FROM material WHERE material_code = #{materialCode}
SELECT process_code, (SELECT process_name FROM process WHERE process_code = bom.process_code) AS process_name FROM bom WHERE material_code = #{materialCode}

SELECT io.lot_no, MAX(io.material_code) as material_code, F_FIND_MAT_NAME(max(io.material_code)) as material_name, F_MAT_COUNT(io.lot_no) AS lot_stock, MAX(m.unit_no) as unit_no, (SELECT max(io_date) FROM inout WHERE lot_no = io.lot_no and inout_no in ('03', '04')) as io_date, (SELECT max(unit_price) FROM inout WHERE lot_no = io.lot_no) as unit_price FROM inout io join material m ON (io.material_code = m.material_code) GROUP BY io.lot_no
HAVING MAX(io.material_code) = #{materialCode}
AND
HAVING
F_MAT_COUNT(io.lot_no) > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inout(io_code, io_date, material_code, io_volume, lot_no, inout_no, comments) VALUES(#{ioCode}, #{ioDate}, #{materialCode}, #{ioVolume}, #{lotNo}, #{inoutNo}, #{comments})
mapper.select: SELECT product_code, f_find_prod_name(product_code) as product_name, product_lot, pror_count, work_date, pror_code, pror_count, f_find_comp_name((select company_code from orders where order_no = (select order_no from detailplan where deplan_idx = detailprorder.deplan_idx) )) as company_name FROM DETAILPRORDER WHERE TRUNC(work_date) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT F_FIND_MAT_NAME( (SELECT distinct material_code FROM inout WHERE lot_no = inputMat.material_lot) ) AS material_name, (SELECT distinct material_code FROM inout WHERE lot_no = inputMat.material_lot) AS material_code, material_lot, input_count FROM inputMat WHERE product_lot = #{productLot}

SELECT distinct work.work_code, bom.process_code, f_find_proc_name(bom.process_code) as process_name, bom.idx, work.work_date, work.start_time, work.end_time FROM bom LEFT JOIN work ON bom.process_code = work.process_code AND work.product_lot = #{productLot} WHERE bom.product_code = #{productCode} ORDER BY bom.idx

SELECT code_id, code_id_nm, code_id_dc, use_at AS code_id_use_at FROM COMTCCMMNCODE WHERE cl_code = 'R10'
AND UPPER(code_id_nm) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{srcCodeIdNm})||'%'
SELECT code_id, code_id_nm, code_id_dc, use_at AS code_id_use_at FROM COMTCCMMNCODE WHERE code_id = #{codeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTCCMMNCODE VALUES(#{codeId}, #{codeIdNm}, #{codeIdDc}, #{codeIdUseAt}, 'R10', sysdate, 'SYSTEM', sysdate, 'SYSTEM')
mapper.select: SELECT code_id, code, code_nm, code_dc, use_at AS code_use_at FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE code_id = #{codeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE VALUES(#{codeId}, #{code}, #{codeNm}, #{codeDc}, #{codeUseAt}, sysdate, 'SYSTEM', sysdate, 'SYSTEM')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE code_id = #{codeId} and code = #{code}
mapper.select: SELECT facilities_name, f_find_proc_name(w.process_code) AS proc_name, f_find_prod_name(w.product_code) AS prod_name, w.product_lot, (SELECT sum(NVL(pror_count,0)) FROM detailprorder WHERE product_code = w.product_code and trunc(work_date) = trunc(sysdate)) AS pror_count, (SELECT SUM(NVL(work_count,0)) FROM work WHERE product_code = w.product_code and trunc(work_date) = trunc(sysdate)) AS work_count, (SELECT sum(NVL(error_count,0)) FROM work WHERE product_code = w.product_code and trunc(work_date) = trunc(sysdate)) AS error_count, (SELECT unit_no FROM product WHERE product_code = w.product_code) AS unit_no FROM work w right join facilities ON w.fac_code = facilities.fac_code --AND TRUNC(work.work_date) = TRUNC(sysdate) AND w.end_time IS NULL

SELECT material_code, material_name, (SELECT code_nm FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE code_id = material.mat_id and code = material.mat_no) as matNm FROM material
upper(${searchCondition}) like '%'||upper(#{keyword})||'%'
${searchCondition} in (SELECT code FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE code_id = 'R_MAT' AND upper(code_nm) like '%' || upper(#{keyword}) || '%' )
ORDER BY material_code

SELECT process_code, process_name FROM process
${searchCondition} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY process_code

SELECT lot_no, (SELECT NVL(SUM(IO_VOLUME),0) FROM INOUT WHERE INOUT_NO IN (01,03,05) and lot_no = i.lot_no) - (SELECT NVL(SUM(IO_VOLUME),0) FROM INOUT WHERE INOUT_NO IN (02,04) and lot_no = i.lot_no) as lot_stock, MIN(io_date) as ioDate FROM inout i WHERE material_code = #{materialCode} AND (SELECT NVL(SUM(IO_VOLUME),0) FROM INOUT WHERE INOUT_NO IN (01,03,05) and lot_no = i.lot_no) - (SELECT NVL(SUM(IO_VOLUME),0) FROM INOUT WHERE INOUT_NO IN (02,04) and lot_no = i.lot_no) > 0 GROUP BY lot_no ORDER BY MIN(io_date)

SELECT company_code, company_name, (select code_nm from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where code_id = comp_id and code = comp_no) as codeNm FROM company
${searchCondition} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and comp_no = #{compNo}
ORDER BY company_code

SELECT product_code, product_name FROM product
${searchCondition} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY product_code

SELECT inorder_code, inorder_date, f_find_comp_name(company_code) as company_name, f_find_mat_name(material_code) as material_name, inorder_count, nvl((select sum(io_volume) from inout where inorder_code = inorder.inorder_code),0) as in_count, inorder_count - nvl((select sum(io_volume) from inout where inorder_code = inorder.inorder_code),0) as yet_count, comments FROM inorder
inorder_count - nvl((select sum(io_volume) from inout where inorder_code = inorder.inorder_code),0) > 0
AND ${searchCondition} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND material_code IN (SELECT material_code FROM material WHERE UPPER(material_name) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' )
AND company_code IN (SELECT company_code FROM company WHERE UPPER(company_name) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' )
ORDER BY inorder_date
